cab.content: C.M. 44 (45) 22nd October 1945 1. The Budget 2. Women’s Land Army: Release Scheme W.L.A. entitled to willing release therefore recruited only for duration. Thought unwise a) during harvest b) therefore cd. be re-directed to agr. Now think it essential to bring in a scheme of willing release. Graded Dec-March acc. to length of service. Appeal to sign on again for a year – with offer of one week’s holiday for 2 years + 3 days for each extra year. Approved.
